plan_details.plan_summary: With Iceland’s Bonus Card programme, you can easily save and spend when you shop. Iceland will give you £1 for every £20 you save on your Bonus Card. Iceland makes saving easy with their Bonus Card programme.
plan_details.plan_description: At checkout, simply tell the cashier how much money you would like to save, present your digital Bonus Card within this app and scan it using the customer facing scanners, as you normally would with your physical card. You will also be able to see your savings balance on your phone. For every £20 you save, Iceland give you £1 absolutely free. Additional benefits include free home delivery when you spend over £25, and exclusive bonuses and offers only for Bonus Cardholders.
plan_details.redeem_instructions: At checkout, simply tell the cashier how much money you would like to save or redeem, present the barcode and scan it using the customer facing scanners, as you normally would with your physical card.
plan_details.plan_register_info: You have added a temporary card. You’ll need to register it to enjoy the full benefits of the programme.

content.value: Find Bonus Card prices in-store and online!
Please enter your details to register with the retailer. We won’t save or store any of the information you provide or edit.

plan_details.plan_summary: Collect 7 stamps for a £7 OFF Meal Voucher. One stamp can be earned per customer per transaction when the qualifying spend in a single transaction for food & drink purchases totals £7.00 or more in a participating Wasabi store. Ts and Cs apply.
plan_details.plan_description:
Please note that your vouchers are single-use and cannot be used twice. Show your Wasabi Club reward code in store to redeem £7 off your next meal.
The voucher will be available to redeem 2 months from the date it is collected. This voucher is non-refundable and cannot be exchanged for cash in part or full and is valid for a single transaction only.

content.value: Spend £7.00 or more to get a stamp. Collect 7 stamps to get a Meal Voucher of up to £7 off your next meal.
Your FREE meal voucher has expired.
EVERYONE GETS £7 OFF IN WASABI CLUB!
Please enter your details to register with the retailer. We won’t save or store any of the information you provide or edit.

Your voucher has been cancelled. If you believe we have made a mistake please contact enquiries@wasabi.uk.com.
Show your Wasabi Club reward code in store to redeem £7 off your next meal.

plan_details.plan_summary: With SquareMeal, you're rewarded for eating out. Go to our website, book selected restaurants, and you'll collect points every time you spend £20 or more. You can easily redeem points on our website for restaurant vouchers & luxury gifts.
plan_details.plan_description: Join SquareMeal Rewards today to make your next dinner even more rewarding. As a member, you'll earn points for booking tables, leaving restaurant reviews, and each time you spend £20 or more in one of our selected restaurants with your linked payment cards. 100 points = £1 spend on your choice of restaurant vouchers, luxury gifts, or charity donations. To book a table or redeem rewards, simply go to our website.
plan_details.redeem_instructions: Only accounts with linked payment cards will receive SquareMeal Rewards Points, when you make a qualifying purchase in a participating restaurant.

content.value: Please enter your details to register with the retailer. We won’t save or store any of the information you provide or edit.

plan_details.plan_summary: Rewards for shopping at ASOS? Sounds good, right? ASOS love to recognise top customers so for every £100 you spend, you get £10 back – even if it's across multiple orders! Just use your linked payment card at checkout (buy now pay later won't count!)
plan_details.plan_description: ASOS is the global destination for fashion-loving 20-somethings. Whatever your vibe, ASOS has got everything you need to take your style to the next level – from event-ready looks to everyday statements. That means 850+ of the best fashion and beauty brands, from iconic names to exclusive in-house labels. Created by ASOS, styled by you.

content.value: You've earned a reward with ASOS EXTRA! Now all you need to do is wait 42 days (to allow for any returns you make to register on our system) and your ASOS EXTRA rewards will show up here, ready for you to make the most of. You can enter your code at checkout under Promo/Student Code or Voucher.
Your ASOS EXTRA gift voucher has expired.
